messages.message: Hello! What are your initial plans?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Hello! What are your initial plans?'.

messages.message: Cool. I don't like Russia so far, so an A/I that can stop a juggernaut would be my preference right now.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Cool. I don't like Russia so far, so an A/I that can stop a juggernaut would be my preference right now.'.

messages.message: Oof. So you decided to attack Austria and now Russia and Turkey are in a much better position. My advice would be to apologize to Austria and fight against this juggernaut that could be forming. Attacking Austria is not gonna work well for you.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Oof. So you decided to attack Austria and now Russia and Turkey are in a much better position. My advice would be to apologize to Austria and fight against this juggernaut that could be forming. Attacking Austria is not gonna work well for you.'.

messages.message: Ummm... a juggernaut means Russia and Turkey hold their alliance above an alliance with Austria or Italy. Russia confirmed in chat with me that he has been planning to work with Turkey since the beginning.
